programme.title: 48 Hours

programme.desc: Doug is thrilled when Patti invites him to dinner, until he finds out that liver and onions will be served. He tries everything — including hypnosis—to finally overcome his phobia of the dish, but only to discover that Patti was just joking.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Truckers often know where to find the best home-style cooking. And what could be better than chicken-fried steak with cream gravy and real coconut cream pie?

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Although chicken dinners are quick to prepare, they can go terribly wrong. Part of the problem is the chicken itself—the breast meat has little fat and becomes dry and chalky if overcooked. The other major source of trouble is improper cooking methods.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: French country cooking has a way with chicken in a pot, whether it's the famous chicken with 40 cloves of garlic or the lesser-known chicken Provençal. These dishes take chicken to new heights—or go awry.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Purchase a good steak and cook it properly, and all it needs is salt and pepper—and, of course, a side of spuds. We wanted potatoes with perfect texture and big flavor—something unusual to accompany a great steak and a good bottle of wine.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Restaurant steak tips are often tough and weirdly seasoned, and thick steak fries can be pale and soggy. The test kitchen felt confident that we could rescue these dishes and turn them into something you would welcome into your home.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: The test kitchen shows you how to prepare two satisfying stir-fries: beef with broccoli and pork with eggplant and onions.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: The test kitchen shows you how to make Pad Thai and Sesame Noodles with Shredded Chicken.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Here we demonstrate how to make three Italian classics: Grilled Chicken ala Diavola, Frico, and Strawberries with Balsamic Vinegar.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Preparing favorite French dishes such as cassoulet or tarte Tatin calls for a lot of patience and time. We wondered if we could find ways to simplify these recipes without sacrificing the qualities that make them classics.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: In the test kitchen, we think afternoon (or morning) tea is an excellent excuse to whip up a batch of scones or a golden loaf of lemon pound cake. Making these baked goods at home certainly yields better results than what you can buy. We'll show you how.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Some days you don't mind spending the morning preparing eggs or baking muffins. But rubbery omelets and dry, hockey puck muffins can make you wonder why you bothered. These brunch recipes are special enough to make you long for Sunday mornings.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Few recipes deliver so much pleasure for so little work as pancakes. The batter comes together in minutes, and the cooking time is brief. Why, then, do most Americans never make pancakes from scratch?

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Although easy to prepare, most cookie recipes are notoriously fickle. A minor ingredient change or fluctuation in oven temperature can yield unexpected results. Our goal was simple: Take two favorite cookies and develop reliable recipes that taste great.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We especially like to use summer berries in a no-bake pie. We wanted a no-bake pie that was every bit as appealing as a traditional double-crust pie—without all of the work.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: The test kitchen decided to tackle two popular sheet cakes—carrot and chocolate—and produce simple recipes that would deliver superior results.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Although some would never dare to adulterate plain cheesecake, variations abound—some good, some bad, some ugly. We wanted our cheesecake to be both light and creamy, with great lemon flavor.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: When entertaining, we like desserts that look more complicated to prepare than they really are. A chocolate mousse cake or chilled lemon soufflé requires basic ingredients but is sure to elicit the proper oohs and aahs from guests.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We like appetizers that deliver big flavor without much work. This means spiced nuts that are not overly sweet, spinach dip that is bold and creamy (not watery and insipid), and beef satay that is tender and vibrant.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Most cooks are under the impression that good soup takes all day to prepare. We'll show you how to make simplified versions of two favorite soups: chicken noodle and Italian pasta and bean.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Soup for supper is an appealing concept, especially on a cold night. But for soup to work as a main course, it better be hearty. Our vibrant lentil soup fits the bill, and we round out this meal with quick cheese bread.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Some local dishes become so popular that they transcend their region. Gumbo is a taste of Louisiana in a big old bowl. And Cincinnati chili is American original, served with buttered spaghetti, kidney beans, cheddar cheese, and chopped onions.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: It sometimes seems the simplest recipes suffer the worst fate in modern cookbooks. The test kitchen was committed to breathing new life into these old-fashioned American recipes: stuffed pork chops, gravy, and glazed carrots.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We offer two inspired takes on roast chicken. Our roast lemon chicken ends with a twist. And there's nothing conventional about cooking a butterflied chicken under a brick. But these two recipes both deliver crisp skin and lots of flavors.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Quick and easy weeknight cooking can still yield great results. We start with two quick-cooking classics— sautéed chicken cutlets and pan-seared shrimp—and elevate them from the everyday.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: In this episode, we offer delicious, relatively straightforward fare that appeals to young and old. What kid—or adult—doesn't look forward to macaroni and cheese or barbecued chicken?

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We take some of our favorite restaurant recipes—Crab Towers and Flambéed Pan-Roasted Lobster—and show you how to make them work in a home kitchen.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Huge meaty flavor—combined with spice, smoke, and fire—epitomizes Texas barbecue. Could we figure out how to make authentic Texas beef ribs in our Boston-based test kitchen?

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Proteger y servir
programme.desc: Danny negocia con un hombre que mantiene a Erin como rehén en la corte. Mientras, Frank decide el castigo para Jamie, quien desobedeció órdenes y fue suspendido.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): La verdad sobre mentir
programme.desc: Danny y Baez investigan la muerte de una adolescente empujada al metro. Frank se molesta por la supervisión del nuevo Inspector General en el NYPD.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando la ex miembro del equipo de la UAC y actual agente de la Interpol, Emily Prentiss localiza a un asesino en serie internacional, pide la ayuda de sus amigos de la UAC.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC está buscando a un sospechoso que está desfigurando víctimas a propósito. Además, Rossi tiene un encuentro incómodo con su exesposa, Hayden Montgomery, quien mantuvo a su hija, Joy, en secreto durante casi 30 años.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando los guardias de la prisión en Virginia interceptan un paquete de pruebas relacionadas con el secuestro de dos niños hace varios años, la UAC interroga a un famoso asesino serial que puede tener información sobre el paradero de los niños.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC se sorprende cuando Hotch es arrestado por un equipo SWAT y por sospecha de conspiración, mientras el equipo se apresura a demostrar su inocencia, sospechan que se avecina un complot mayor.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Fe
programme.desc: Cuando el hijo alistado de un coronel retirado convertido en predicador aparece muerto, el equipo cree que puede ser víctima de un crimen de odio. Mientras tanto, el padre de Gibbs viene de visita por vacaciones.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Ignición
programme.desc: Cuando un piloto de la Marina es encontrado muerto en extrañas circunstancias en una zona aislada, el equipo se encuentra luchando contra un abogado sin escrúpulos con una agenda oculta.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Asuntos familiares
programme.desc: Gibbs cuestiona la capacidad de DiNozzo para hacer su trabajo cuando el mayor de los DiNozzo se involucra en su última investigación, en el episodio 150 de NCIS.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: París
programme.desc: Cuando la testigo estrella del gobierno en un caso de malversación es objetivo de un asesino, depende del equipo ayudarla a llegar a casa con vida.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): La verdad sobre mentir
programme.desc: Danny y Baez investigan la muerte de una adolescente empujada al metro. Frank se molesta por la supervisión del nuevo Inspector General en el NYPD.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Desaparecida
programme.desc: Danny y Baez sospechan que una niña podría ser víctima de secuestro, pero su madre lo niega, aunque su historia no cuadra. Mientras, Frank visita a un sacerdote, consejero del NYPD, arrestado por conducir ebrio.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Músculo
programme.desc: Jamie es cuestionado por la muerte de un pandillero que perseguía. Baez se infiltra para investigar al prometido de la ex de Danny, quien vende drogas desde su gimnasio.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Apuestas mortales
programme.desc: Un oficial es acusado de usar fuerza excesiva, lo que pone al departamento bajo escrutinio. Danny y Maria investigan el asesinato de un corredor de valores endeudado.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A trespassing suspect claims to be a federal informant, officers inspect an erratically driven car and find a safe, and a familiar face swears this time she's going to rehab.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers dress a naked man who is causing a disturbance, a barefoot man denies evading police, and an intoxicated woman and her husband tell two different stories.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Police search for a passenger who fled from a traffic stop, a driver not wearing a seatbelt finds himself in more trouble, and detectives respond to a domestic violence call.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Police chase a man running away from his car and a warrant, a driver is just as unlicensed as his vehicle, and a domestic violence call involves two lovers and a hammer.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A shoplifter flees on foot after stealing kids' shoes, an erratic driver has a concealed firearm (and something less concealed), and a man on probation gets his car searched.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A driver theorizes about America after fleeing a traffic stop, charges keep adding up for an unlicensed driver, and a woman stops at nothing to get to her trailer.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A driver leaves her car during a routine traffic stop, officers stop a car that appears to have fake tags, and police respond to an altercation between a father and son.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers suspect meth use by a man sleeping in a bus station, a pedestrian's multiple bags of drugs suggest trafficking, and a drunk driver claims she was set up.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A burglary results in an act of solidarity, a foot pursuit ends when the K-9 unit shows up, and a person with a substance user disorder leaves a strong impression on an officer.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man on a motorcycle evades an officer, a woman in a suspicious vehicle accrues multiple charges, and a traffic stop reveals two men under the influence.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man crashes a stolen vehicle into a house, a woman who took a cell phone video of her ex explains the dispute to officers, and a man is stopped for suspected trespassing.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man gets busted during a drug deal, a cyclist gets confused when an officer finds narcotics in his pants, and officers respond to reports of gunfire.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Police are led on a lengthy chase, a man is pulled over in a new car he doesn't own, and a detained woman has choice words about her boyfriend.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A young woman claims not to know her passengers, the search of a man's car leads to more charges, and a woman learns not to start vehicles with a screwdriver.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Police go off-roading to follow a stolen car, a man has odd excuses for having suspicious items, and an officer settles a dispute between a wife and her jealous husband.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man in hiding is sniffed out quickly by the K-9 unit, a couple gets caught lying when an officer recognizes them, and a woman's dogs save her a trip to jail.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A motorcyclist tries to escape on foot, a couple's synthetic marijuana use catches up with them, and an officer tries to get the real story behind a domestic disturbance.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A skittish driver’s decision results in a trip to the hospital. A car full of young men swear they were trying to escape an imminent threat. An innocent woman struggles with the decision to press charges on her friend.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A little rain doesn’t stop a determined quad driver from trying to outrun police. A deputy has doubts about a man’s professed distrust of banks. A man ignores obvious red flags when buying a moped and ends up paying the price.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A soft-spoken cyclist finds a way to shock deputies. A family man remorsefully agrees with police that his COVID-19 fears led him to make a mistake. Officers investigate a car they spot swerving on the road.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: The owner of a truck discovers what happens when you don’t lock your door. Police level with a troubled man and implore him to make better choices. An officer acts as a therapist for multiple people and their relationships.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Deputies work together to stay on the tail of a fleeing vehicle. An argumentative driver keeps his friends tuned in as he livestreams his own arrest. A mother’s desire to scare her daughter into behaving takes a serious turn.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Deputies are concerned when a fleeing man leaves a trail of illicit items. A young woman unwisely decides to hang out with a man she nicknamed 'Sketchy.' Some well-placed security cameras help reunite a man with his stolen bike.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man weaves a stolen motorbike through traffic at high speeds as he tries to evade police. Deputies examine the aftermath of a violent domestic argument. A mom and dad deny that their habits could affect their child.

programme.title: COPS

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A woman asks police to get involved after her ex threatened to destroy her home. Prior medical procedures drive a woman to find a dangerous way to ease her pain. Deputies search for a mysterious driver who fled a car crash.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A seasoned corporal gives some advice to a young man with a new motorcycle. A woman’s impatience lands her in hot water when she’s pulled over for tailgating. Officers give a driver multiple chances to come clean to no avail.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: When a new murder leads to a connection with an infamous serial killer, Grissom secretly joins the class of well-known criminal pathologist Dr. Raymond Langston, to gain access to the killer and get a crack in the case.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: The CSI team is shocked and saddened when, after working with Dr. Raymond Langston on the Dick & Jane murders, Grissom announces that his time as a CSI has come to an end and offers Langston a permanent position on the CSI team.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: The first day on the job for Dr. Langston turns from bad to worse when a simple burglary case quickly overlaps with a complicated arson and homicide case.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: When an FBI agent who was working undercover is found brutally murdered, the CSI team is called in to assist the victim's partner in finding the killer.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Langston and Nick are called to investigate a murder at a fast food restaurant and have quite a task ahead of them when they discover that much of the evidence is coated in cooking oil.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: While Langston testifies in the trial of a respected Congressman, new evidence sends the CSIs back to the lab to reopen the investigation.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: The CSIs are called to three different crime scenes in one night that are seemingly unrelated, but each case's forensic evidence reveals a common link.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: When the CSIs are called to a murder scene at a familiar motel, Nick is thrown for a loop as he pieces together three separate murder investigations that all took place at the same establishment over the course of a year.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Langston and Riley are taken hostage during the aftermath of a shootout in an usually calm Las Vegas community.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Langston is shocked when his former student is found murdered and becomes the focus of a CSI investigation into the world of Mexican wrestling.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Nick's case of a deceased skydiver takes an interesting turn when Catherine discovers there may be a connection between the skydiver and a mysterious double murder case.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: When Hodges and Wendy run into each other at a science fiction convention for one of their favorite classic television shows, they end up investigating the murder of one of their beloved actors.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Catherine revisits one of the very first cases she worked as a CSI when the convicted felon in the murder claims the verdict was based on faulty evidence.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: An unexplained illness that is affecting random citizens of Las Vegas baffles the CSIs.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Un asesinato lleva al CSI a investigar un psicópata que cumple cadena perpetua. Durante la investigación, Grissom acude a una conferencia del doctor Raymond Langston, un reputado patólogo criminal, para pedirle ayuda en el esclarecimiento del caso.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: El equipo de CSI se sorprende y entristece cuando, después de trabajar con el Dr. Raymond Langston en los asesinatos de parejas, Grissom anuncia que su tiempo como CSI ha llegado a su fin y le ofrece a Langston un puesto permanente en el equipo.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: El primer día de trabajo del Dr. Langston va de mal en peor cuando un simple caso de robo rápidamente se superpone con un complicado caso de incendio provocado y homicidio.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Cuando un agente del FBI que trabajaba encubierto es encontrado brutalmente asesinado, se llama al equipo de CSI para ayudar al compañero de la víctima a encontrar al asesino.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Langston y Nick son llamados para investigar un asesinato en un restaurante de comida rápida y tienen una gran tarea por delante cuando descubren que gran parte de la evidencia está cubierta con aceite de cocina.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Mientras Langston testifica en el juicio de un respetado congresista, nuevas pruebas envían al equipo de CSI de vuelta al laboratorio para reabrir la investigación.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: El equipo acude a tres escenarios de diferentes crímenes en una misma noche. Aparentemente, no están relacionados, pero las pruebas forenses de cada caso revela un vínculo común.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Cuando el CSI va a la escena del crimen en un motel familiar, Nick comienza a relacionar tres asesinatos que se han cometido allí ese año.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Langston y Riley son tomados como rehenes después de un tiroteo en una comunidad normalmente tranquila de Las Vegas.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Un antiguo alumno de Ray es asesinado. La investigación les llevará hasta el mundo de la lucha libre mexicana.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: El caso de Nick sobre un paracaidista herido dará un giro cuando Catherine descubra que está relacionado con un caso de doble asesinato.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Cuando Hodges y Wendy se encuentran en una convención de ciencia ficción de uno de sus programas de televisión favoritos, terminan investigando el asesinato de uno de sus queridos actores.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Catherine revisa uno de los primeros casos en los que trabajó como CSI cuando el delincuente condenado por el asesinato afirma que el veredicto se basó en pruebas defectuosas.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Una enfermedad inexplicable que afecta a ciudadanos al azar de Las Vegas desconcierta a los CSI.

programme.desc: A dangerous investigation leads the CSI team down a treacherous road that will lead to the tragic loss of one of their own.

programme.desc: A jury field trip to the scene of a murder flips the legal tables when the defendant ends up dead and the twelve jurors become the prime suspects.

programme.desc: Cuando la gasolina se vuelve tan cara que los residentes de Miami matan por ella, el equipo de CSI se enfrenta cara a cara con una de las redes criminales más sádicas de la ciudad.

programme.desc: Un salvaje doble asesinato en los Everglades hace que Horatio y el equipo de CSI se enfrenten a la fuerza bruta de la propia mafia rusa de Miami.

programme.desc: Cuando el equipo de CSI investiga un asesinato en la boutique de moda más moderna de Miami, Horatio descubre que la inestabilidad de Julia la ha convertido en una bomba de tiempo.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Una grúa de 60 metros se estrella contra un rascacielos de Miami, pone en peligro a Calleigh y Delko y acaba con la esperanza de Horatio de atrapar a un famoso jefe del crimen.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Encuentran a un hombre esposado y apuñalado en su habitación de hotel, mientras que una broma en el laboratorio provoca una ruptura en el equipo de CSI y amenaza su investigación.

programme.desc: Cuando un asesino secuestra a un inocente bebé, Horatio y el equipo de CSI deben encontrarlo antes de que el niño se convierta en su próxima víctima.

programme.desc: Cuando un salvaje asesino anda desenfrenado en Miami, Horatio debe intervenir para evitar que un miembro de la fuerza policial se acerque demasiado al caso.

programme.desc: Cuando un tirador apunta al motel donde se aloja Delko, Horatio y el equipo de CSI deben investigar el pasado de Delko para encontrar al asesino.

programme.desc: El equipo de CSI, con la ayuda de informantes locales, lucha para salvar un vecindario que está a punto de ser dominado por una violenta pandilla callejera.

programme.desc: Horatio y el equipo de CSI usan tecnología radical para descubrir el secreto de la mente de un hombre cuando este aparece cubierto de sangre sin recordar dónde ha estado.

programme.desc: Mac investigates the death of a girl found in a bathtub filled with rose petals. Stella questions the death of a man who fell in his fish tank.

programme.desc: Mac and Danny investigate a case in which a delusional ex-con is found dead in his home while lying on top of a bed of cash.

programme.desc: The team investigates a case in which magic-trick inspired murders occur including a woman being cut in half while in a wooden box.

programme.desc: Danny and Lindsay find popular chef Alec Green dead in the wine cellar of his trendy restaurant with a corkscrew dangling from his chest.

programme.desc: A serial killer’s verdict overturned when Mac jails his arresting officer, but a victim surfaces sporting the killer’s signature.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Stella is forced to deal with painful memories when Det. Valens visits and says her DNA is connected to a Philadelphia cold case making her a suspect.

programme.desc: The CSIs are puzzled when evidence and witnesses point to John McEnroe as their murder suspect despite his air-tight alibi.

programme.desc: Mac, Stella, and Hawkes are forced to save the lab when a drug lord and his crew descend upon the CSI’s vault to retrieve their merchandise.

programme.title: Caso Cerrado

programme.title: Caso Cerrado

programme.title: Caso Cerrado

programme.desc: David Abbott, un arquitecto solitario, encuentra un increíble apartamento en San Francisco, solo para descubrir que está embrujado por el espíritu del inquilino anterior, Elizabeth Masterson, una doctora superdotada que está en coma.

programme.title: Cosas que diría con solo mirarla

programme.title: La chica de rosa
programme.desc: Ella es una chica de la secundaria del lado equivocado de la ciudad. Él es el galán rico que la invita al baile de graduación. Pero con la misma velocidad que crece su romance, crece la amenaza de la dolorosa presión de los amigos.

programme.title: Volando Alto
programme.desc: Gwyneth Paltrow protagoniza en esta comedia hilarante sobre una chica de pueblo con grandes planes. Cuando se propone ser azafata internacional de primera clase, Donna se arriesga y sale a perseguir su sueño.

programme.title: Como si fuera cierto
programme.desc: David Abbott, un arquitecto solitario, encuentra un increíble apartamento en San Francisco, solo para descubrir que está embrujado por el espíritu del inquilino anterior, Elizabeth Masterson, una doctora superdotada que está en coma.

programme.title: Cosas que diría con solo mirarla
programme.desc: Una historia compuesta de cinco tramas entrelazadas que se centran en un grupo de mujeres cuyas vidas, en el transcurso de unos pocos días, se enredan, se erosionan, se enriquecen y, finalmente, terminan por cambiar para siempre.

programme.title: Nobleza ranchera
programme.desc: Don Fernando regresa de la capital con sus dos hijas. Pronto se desatará una tragedia en su propio rancho, cuando ellas se disputen el amor de Luis.

programme.title: Pancho López
programme.desc: Un hombre es enviado a vender el ganado de un tío, pierde todo el dinero en el juego e inventa que fue asaltado.

programme.title: Papá en onda
programme.desc: Ricardo es un hombre de negocios cuyos tres hijos adolescentes viven con su esposa. Esta comedia se centra en las dinámicas familiares entre Ricardo y sus hijos, así como su relación con su amigo Julio, un soltero que viva la vida al máximo.

programme.title: Pecado de juventud
programme.desc: Una sirvienta embarazada del joven de la casa donde trabaja es despedida de su trabajo y un vecino abogado le ofrece su ayuda para hacer que el joven se comprometa con ella, o al menos darle una ayuda para criar a su hijo.

programme.title: Peligros de juventud
programme.desc: Un grupo de estudiantes enfrenta un enredo amoroso. Uno de ellos, un joven limpiabotas, está perdidamente enamorado de una chica, pero ella ama a otro, quien, a su vez, está interesado en alguien más.

programme.title: Pervertida
programme.desc: Una joven provinciana termina cayendo en las garras de la perdición y la prostitución en Ciudad de México.

programme.title: Pies de Gato
programme.desc: Luis Aguilar encabeza el elenco en esta historia de una banda de bandidos alegres cuyas hazañas son más divertidas que despreciables. Continuación de "Los bandidos de Río Frío" (1954).

programme.title: Pistolas De Oro
programme.desc: Un hombre conocido como "Pistolas de Oro" tiene la costumbre de disparar a la gente en defensa propia. Cuando recibe un disparo, visita a un sacerdote que atiende sus heridas y le aconseja que cambie su vida.

programme.title: Solo Dios perdona
programme.desc: Only God Forgives reúne la visión del célebre director Nicolas Winding Refn (DRIVE) con Ryan Gosling en un thriller de suspenso ambientado en los sórdidos bajos fondos de Bangkok.

programme.title: Jade
programme.desc: Corelli está hasta el cuello en un caso que puede conducirlo donde no quiere ir. Chazz Palminteri interpreta a Matt, abogado y amigo de Corelli. Linda Fiorentino es la esposa de Matt, Trina; una psicóloga capaz de todo incluso de asesinar.

programme.title: Transpecos (LAS)
programme.desc: For three US Border Patrol agents, the contents of one car reveals a dark secret within their unit that could cost them all their lives. SXSW Grand Jury Award Winner 2016

programme.title: El esposo incorrecto
programme.desc: Melanie nota que su marido está actuando diferente cuando se revela que en realidad es su gemelo idéntico.

programme.title: Número De Suerte
programme.desc: John Travolta y Lisa Kudrow forman un "equipo de comedia de alta energía" en esta comedia divertida inspirada en una estafa de la vida real para ganar la lotería de Pensilvania.

programme.title: Manhattan en la oscuridad
programme.desc: Cuando una viuda seductora le pide a un periodista que resuelva la misteriosa muerte de su marido, la investigación lo sumerge en un peligroso mundo de adulterio, chantaje y asesinato.

programme.title: La Trampa
programme.desc: El ganador del Oscar, Adrien Brody, Antonio Banderas y John Malkovich protagonizan esta atrapante y explosiva historia policial sobre tres criminales atrapados en un depósito tras un asalto.

programme.title: El abogado del mal
programme.desc: Jamie Foxx presenta la inspiradora historia real del director de una banda de música de instituto que transformó a su variopinta banda de jazz en un legendario grupo de funk que arrasó en todo el país.

programme.title: Las cuatro plumas
programme.desc: Harry Feversham es un soldado con gran futuro hasta que renuncia a su regimiento. Es tachado de cobarde, repudiado por su familia, su prometida y su mejor amigo. Tras saber que su regimiento ha sido atacado, se embarca en una travesía de redención.

programme.title: La conquista del honor
programme.desc: Del director ganador del premio de la Academia Clint Eastwood y del ganador del premio de la Academia Steven Spielberg, llega la historia de los seis hombres que izaron la bandera en la Batalla de Iwo Jima, un punto de inflexión en la Segunda Guerra.

programme.title: Ocho hombres
programme.desc: Una dramatización sobre el infame Escándalo de los Medias Negras de 1919, en el que ocho miembros de los Chicago White Sox conspiraron con apostadores para entregar la Serie Mundial a cambio de dinero.

programme.title: La caza del Octubre Rojo
programme.desc: Un submarino nuclear ruso con tecnología superior se dirige a la costa de los EE.UU.; sin embargo, un analista de la CIA cree que el capitán va a desertar, y tiene apenas unas horas para probarlo.

programme.title: Fuimos héroes
programme.desc: En 1965, Estados Unidos está en guerra con Vietnam del Norte, y el teniente coronel Hal Moore prepara a sus tropas para una de las batallas más violentas de la historia de EE. UU.: “El valle de la muerte”.

programme.title: Corazón valiente
programme.desc: Corazón valiente, la detallada y feroz saga de combate, amor tierno y la voluntad de arriesgarlo todo por la libertad. Película de Mel Gibson, ganadora del Premio de la Academia®. En una actuación cargada de emociones.

programme.title: Caza Terrorista
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage enciende un barril de pólvora de acción mientras un veterano agente de la CIA va a la caza de su némesis, un terrorista mortal.

programme.title: Edad de hielo
programme.desc: Terremotos masivos abren la placa tectónica árabe, lo que produce temperaturas bajo cero que serán mortales al anochecer.

programme.title: El cuervo 2: Ciudad de Ángeles
programme.desc: Esta secuela veloz y llena de acción de "El cuervo" sigue el ascenso de la víctima de asesinato Ashe Corven, que regresa a la vida gracias a un misterioso cuervo. Con la ayuda de una mujer llamada Sarah, se venga de sus asesinos uno por uno.

programme.title: El pacificador
programme.desc: Cuando un tren que transporta ojivas nucleares se estrella en la Unión Soviética, la especialista nuclear Dra. Kelly descubre que el accidente es en realidad parte de un complot para cubrir el robo de las armas.

programme.title: The Cold Light of Day
programme.desc: Bruce Willis, Sigourney Weaver and Henry Cavill star in this pulse-pounding thriller about a man trying to save his kidnapped family.

programme.title: Hostage
programme.desc: Un negociador de la policía fracasado que se convierte en un oficial de una pequeña ciudad debe salvar a una familia secuestrada, lo que lo conduce a una situación muy peligrosa.

programme.title: El pacificador
programme.desc: Cuando un tren que transporta ojivas nucleares se estrella en la Unión Soviética, la especialista nuclear Dra. Kelly descubre que el accidente es en realidad parte de un complot para cubrir el robo de las armas.

programme.title: Hotel para perros
programme.desc: Un adolescente huérfano que aloja en secreto a perros perdidos en un hotel abandonado. Basado en la novela de Lois Duncan.

programme.title: El hijo de Rambow
programme.desc: Una historia fresca sobre la amistad, la familia, los héroes cinematográficos y la riesgosa aventura de crecer en la era del video.

programme.desc: El francotirador Matthew Quigley (Tom Selleck) cree que ha sido contratado para matar perros salvajes en Australia, pero un rico ganadero (Alan Rickman) tiene otros planes para el francotirador. Laura San Giacomo coprotagoniza este elegante western.

programme.title: Aventuras en Dinotopia
programme.desc: David Scott y su hermano Karl se encuentran en la aventura de su vida cuando se encuentran atrapados en Dinotopia.

programme.title: Lemony Snicket una serie de eventos desafortunados
programme.desc: Una emocionante desventura con tres ingeniosos huérfanos y un villano actor llamado Conde Olaf (Jim Carrey) quien busca quitarles su enorme fortuna.

programme.title: Hotel para perros
programme.desc: Un adolescente huérfano que aloja en secreto a perros perdidos en un hotel abandonado. Basado en la novela de Lois Duncan.

programme.title: El hijo de Rambow
programme.desc: Una historia fresca sobre la amistad, la familia, los héroes cinematográficos y la riesgosa aventura de crecer en la era del video.

programme.title: Euroviaje
programme.desc: Europa nunca será la misma después de que Scotty Thomas y sus amigos aterrizan para vivir aventuras y excesos, haciendo las cosas más alocadas en el viaje más salvaje de sus vidas!

programme.desc: Cuando Anna Wyncomb conoce un club de lucha clandestino exclusivamente femenino para cambiar el caos de su vida, descubre que está mucho más conectada personalmente con la historia del club de lo que jamás podría imaginar.

programme.title: Un par de seductores
programme.desc: Dos estafadores rivales hacen una apuesta: ganará el primero que estafe cincuenta mil dólares a la próxima mujer que conozca, y el otro se irá de la ciudad. Hay mucho en juego en esta comedia divertida, ingeniosa, sucia y podrida.

programme.title: Estrenando cuerpo
programme.desc: El cómico en aprietos Lance Barton sabe cómo es morir en escena. Pero cuando su vida toma un giro inesperado, directo al cielo, Lance está seguro de que ha habido un error.

programme.title: Jefe de estado
programme.desc: Cuando Washington necesita desesperadamente un candidato presidencial que sea garantía de perder las elecciones, escogen a Mayes Gilliam (Chris Rock), un desconocido político local de barrio, para que sea su títere.

programme.title: Norbit
programme.desc: Murphy protagoniza a un Norbit apacible, que recibe una segunda oportunidad con el amor de su infancia, Kate. Sin embargo, los obstáculos podrían complicar este romance más de lo esperado.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Jack Black encarna el papel más gracioso como Ignacio, un cocinero de monasterio que alimenta huérfanos de día y por las noches se transforma en Nacho Libre, un notorio luchador en calzas.

programme.title: Jefe de estado
programme.desc: Cuando Washington necesita desesperadamente un candidato presidencial que sea garantía de perder las elecciones, escogen a Mayes Gilliam (Chris Rock), un desconocido político local de barrio, para que sea su títere.

programme.title: Recién cazado
programme.desc: Sebastián es un destacado enólogo que lleva una vida desordenada y una mañana, al despertar de una parranda, descubre que contrajo matrimonio la noche anterior con Alexa. A partir de ese momento buscará anular el compromiso.

programme.title: Mientras Duermes
programme.desc: Un portero trastornado que tiene la manía de atormentar a sus residentes decide intimidar a la vecina más alegre y arruinarle la vida a toda costa.

programme.title: La boda de Valentina
programme.desc: Valentina tiene la vida perfecta en Estados Unidos. Su universo tiembla cuando su novio Jason le propone matrimonio y debe enfrentar a su familia, “los perfectos Tate”, con la suya, “los Hidalgo”, la dinastía política más caótica de la historia de México.

programme.title: Casese Quien Pueda
programme.desc: The best-laid love plans go hilariously awry in this romantic-comedy hit about two sisters (Martha and Miriam Higareda) who find themselves in uncharted romantic territory.

programme.title: Me late chocolate
programme.desc: Después de que su prometido muere inesperadamente, una mujer decide aceptar la vida y seguir su sueño de trabajar con chocolate.

programme.title: ¿Quieres ser mi hijo?
programme.desc: Una mujer de 40 años le pide a su vecino de 23 años, a quien detesta, que finja ser su hijo, durante un viaje de fin de semana para obtener un trabajo que le ayudará a regresar a la vida que perdió.

programme.title: Me late chocolate
programme.desc: Después de que su prometido muere inesperadamente, una mujer decide aceptar la vida y seguir su sueño de trabajar con chocolate.

programme.title: El bebé de Rosemary
programme.desc: La historia de una joven pareja que espera su primer bebé. Como casi todas las primerizas, Rosemary se siente confundida. Su marido, un actor ambicioso pero sin éxito, hace un pacto con el diablo que promete llevar su carrera a la fama.

programme.title: Sospechoso cero
programme.desc: Un agente del FBI que investiga la muerte de un asesino serial sigue la pista de un justiciero que dedica su vida a perseguir asesinos seriales.

programme.title: El lobo de snow hollow
programme.desc: El sheriff de un pueblo pequeño y su apático equipo de oficiales deben resolver una serie de asesinatos que ocurren en la luna llena. Mientras es consumido por la búsqueda del asesino, lucha por recordarse a sí mismo que los hombres lobo no existen...

programme.title: Freeway
programme.desc: Intentando huir de su vida, la delincuente juvenil adolescente Vanessa Lutz se va a vivir con su abuela. En su camino, conoce a Bob Wolverton, un asesino en serie encantador pero sádico.

programme.title: Sabor a sangre y chocolate
programme.desc: Adaptación del relato de la autora Annette Curtis Klause acerca de una joven loba adolescente, que debe elegir entre su amor por un joven humano muy lindo y honrar la lealtad de la manada.

programme.title: Sueños de un asesino
programme.desc: La vida pacífica de la familia de Claire Cooper (Annette Bening) sufre un cambio terrorífico cuando un asesino serial (Robert Downey Jr.) invade su pueblo de Nueva Inglaterra... y acosa sus sueños con pistas de sus próximos movimientos mortales.

programme.title: La hija de la luz
programme.desc: Con rasgos que rememoran al sexto sentido y la profecía llega este fascinante thriller sobrenatural lleno de escalofríos y un gran suspenso.

programme.title: Cattle Annie And Little Britches
programme.desc: Two young aspiring outlaws (Amanda Plummer and Diane Lane) manage to join what’s left of the Doolin-Dalton gang, led by the aging Bill Doolin (Burt Lancaster). The gang’s heyday may be far behind them, but there’s still plenty of adventure left!

programme.title: McLintock!
programme.desc: The cattle rancher McLintock (John Wayne) puts his brand on the territory and every woman in it! Louise Warren plays a widow who moves with her two children onto McLintock’s ranch to serve as cook, while Maureen O’Hara plays the estranged wife.

programme.title: Fort Yuma
programme.desc: When a revered Apache chief is brutally murdered en route to Fort Yuma to negotiate a peace treaty, all-out war erupts in this rousing -- and surprisingly touching -- western starring Peter Graves and directed by the legendary Lesley Selander.

programme.title: The Hills Run Red
programme.desc: A man recently released from a five-year prison sentence seeks vengeance against the former friend who has violated his trust and sought his death. Starring Thomas Hunter, Henry Silva, and Dan Duryea.

programme.title: Invitation to a Gunfighter
programme.desc: Screen legend Yul Brynner turns in a magnificent performance as a gunfighter who must do battle with his most formidable adversary - his own conscience - in this gripping, double-barreled western full of surprise twists and colorful villainy.

programme.title: Fort Massacre
programme.desc: Joel McCrea gives a compelling performance as a cavalry sergeant apparently leading his men to safety, but actually slowly going mad in an insane attempt to avenge an Indian massacre.

programme.title: The Broken Star
programme.desc: A marshal murders a rancher for gold, but is foiled by his assistant.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: Prelude to Murder (in Color)
programme.desc: A trio of music boxes contains the hidden secret to riches, and a group of criminals will kill for them. In Vibrant Color!

programme.title: South Pacific

programme.title: Horizon
programme.desc: In 2000, scientists made a groundbreaking discovery, explaining how birds evolved from dinosaurs. However, a deeper investigation put a question mark over everything.

programme.title: The Truth About Killer Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Bird expert Bill Oddie helps construct amazing, life-sized, bio-mechanical replicas as he presents an imaginary battle between a tyrannosaurus rex and a triceratops.

programme.title: The Truth About Killer Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Here, Bill Oddie asks whether the Velociraptor was really the monstrous predator of popular legend.

programme.title: Lost Worlds: Vanished Lives
programme.desc: David travels the world to unravel some of the wonders and puzzles of palaeontology. But how do you find the world's oldest and rarest reptile?

programme.title: Lost Worlds: Vanished Lives
programme.desc: Could pterodactyls fly? And why did trilobites have such good eyes? David Attenborough investigates the secret lives of animals from the past, as told in the fossil record.

programme.title: Lost Worlds: Vanished Lives
programme.desc: David Attenborough uncovers dinosaur bones in the Sahara desert and visits the biggest, most spectacular dinosaur displays in the world.

programme.title: Lost Worlds: Vanished Lives
programme.desc: David Attenborough uncovers bizarre creatures of the earliest seas, tiny horses the size of spaniels and an animal that's half bird and half reptile - the rarest of them all.

programme.title: Iceman: Mummy From the Stone Age
programme.desc: The discovery of a 5,000-year-old male mummy in the Austrian Alps has enabled scientists to re-create a vanished world.

programme.title: Walking with Monsters: Life Before Dinosaurs
programme.desc: The evolution of the predators who lived 550 million years ago, and how the first amphibians migrated from sea to land.

programme.title: Walking with Monsters: Life Before Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Three hundred million years ago, the forests were ruled by insects. This was a world in which giant dragonflies battled with two-foot-wide spiders.

programme.title: Walking with Monsters: Life Before Dinosaurs
programme.desc: On the supercontinent Pangea, early therapsids, creatures more similar to mammals than reptiles, fight for survival alongside other animals. In the carboniferous swamps, insects and arthropods take over and grow into giants.

programme.title: How to Build a Dinosaur
programme.desc: Dinosaurs died out 65 million years ago and we have hardly ever found a complete skeleton. So how do we turn a pile of broken bones into a dinosaur exhibit? Dr Alice Roberts finds out how the experts put skeletons back together.

programme.title: Science of Walking With Beasts
programme.desc: This episode explains how the 120-million-year reign of the dinosaurs ended when mammals became the fastest and fiercest creatures on the planet.

programme.title: Science of Walking With Beasts
programme.desc: A look at the science that has proved Darwin's idea that intelligent, sophisticated humans have an ancestral connection with the ape.

programme.title: Horizon
programme.desc: Exploring Mongolia's Gobi Desert to determine whether dinosaurs exist in the present as birds. It is one of the harshest places on Earth with the biggest dinosaur graveyard.

programme.title: Horizon
programme.desc: Until recently most scientists thought they knew what killed off the dinosaurs. It was a 10 km-wide meteorite which smashed into Yucatan in Mexico.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog goes after Virginia, a hard-to-find lawbreaker. He gets a tip that a pickup truck will be going to Virginia's house. In true private-eye fashion, the team tails the truck in two SUVs, regularly switching the follow car to throw off their scent.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter

programme.title: I Love Lucy

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy and Ethel are eager to get a closer look at the belongings of the O'Briens, new neighbors in the building. They snoop around in their apartment while they are away and when they hear the O'Briens return, Lucy is trapped in the closet.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: After the Mertzes have a quarrel the Ricardos try their best to get them back together. Lucy invites each of them to dinner without the other knowing. The Mertzes finally reconcile but in the process, the Ricardos squabble.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy hates the mustache that Ricky grows for a potential movie role and demands that he shave it off. When he refuses, Lucy gets a fake beard and glues it on her face. To teach Ricky a lesson, she kisses her husband with the beard on when he arrives home.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: When Ricky forbids Lucy from gossiping, she tapes her mouth shut but reveals the latest rumor to Ethel through charades. However, it seems it's the proverbial black pot and kettle when Ricky shares with Fred a spicy tidbit about one of his band members.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy and Ethel are tired of their dishpan hands and demand dishwashers from their husbands. They also don't think the Society Matrons League, a club they want to join, would approve. Their husbands believe they have it easy compared to the olden days.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: A close inspection of her marriage license convinces Lucy that she and Ricky are not legally married. Because his name is misspelled on the certificate, Lucy insists Ricky go through the entire courtship and ultimately the marriage ceremony again.

programme.title: I Love Lucy

programme.title: I Love Lucy

programme.desc: El Noruego emprende en un nuevo negocio con pulgas, mientras que el Abuelo y Jonathan son tomados como rehenes por unos crimínales en un asalto al banco.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Jonathan y Gaspar buscan darle una lección al Abuelo en en Día del Padre, mientras que el Noruego se siente que no es valorado por Olaf y junto con Peluzín deciden tomar cartas en el asunto.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Abuelo se topa un con Genio quien le conceda varios deseos, mientras que el Noruego decide lanzarle una fiesta sorpresa de cumpleaños a Olaf para que recupere su infancia perdida.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: La compañía donde trabaja Gaspar atraviesa un recorte de personal pero el es de los pocos afortunados que se salva y es mandado a una capacitación a Estados Unidos, mientras que Peluzín toma el papel de Gaspar en México.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Gaspar atraviesa una crisis en su periodo de entrenamiento en Estados Unidos, mientras que el resto de la familia decide alcanzar a Gaspar

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego se enamora de la estatua de cera de Ivanka Trump y toda la familia decide hacer un viaje y atravesar todo el país en auto hasta Nueva York.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego decide ir a NY a conocer a la verdadera Ivanka pero en el camino el grupo se separa de el Abuelo y Peluzín.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego sigue con su plan de casarse con la Ivanka de cera, mientras que el Abuelo y Peluzín afianzan su relación después de su gran viaje

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: La familia va a Washington a pedir la mano de Ivanka con un resultado inesperado, mientras que Johnny busca deshacer la relación enfermiza entre el Abuelo y Peluzín.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego recibe la sorpresa que después de una muchos años de crímenes su papá le deja un jugoso botín como herencia, mientras que Jonathan y Ortega buscan a un adulto que los lleve a la premier de la película del momento.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego se muda a un lujoso departamento y se dedica a buscar a un nuevo roommate, mientras que El Abuelo y Jonathan se pelean por quedarse con el cuarto una vez que el Noruego dejo el departamento.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Jonathan es admitido a una reconocida escuela privada y Gaspar al no poder cubrir los gastos decide aventurarse con Peluzín en unos negocios turbios, mientras el Noruego busca consejos por parte de su familia porque no esta contento.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El abuelo se ahoga con un hueso de pollo y LFDB se ve forzada a buscar ayuda de emergencia, mientras que el Noruego y Peluzín deciden ingresar a un gimnasio y competir por los resultados.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Abuelo se involucra sentimentalmente con la nueva roommate del Noruego, la cual esconde un oscuro secreto, mientras tanto Peluzín y Jony buscan lanzar a Olaf al estrellato.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Tenta-Culo celebra su aniversario y hace una gran fiesta donde invita a todos, desafortunadamente durante el evento sucede un crimen y nadie puede salir hasta encontrar al responsable.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Gaspar y el Abuelo se topan con una familia muy peculiar, situación que el Abuelo busca aprovechar, mientras que Peluzín y Pitipu buscan curar a Don Sebas de una extraña adicción.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El noruego busca crear un vínculo de nuevo con su hijo Olaf por medio de un regalo, mientras que el Abuelo, Johnatan, Peluzín y todo el edificio están vueltos locos con los álbumes de estampitas del mundial 2018.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego cansado de que todo mundo lo busque solo por su dinero busca a Pitipú para que le ayude a idear un plan, mientras que Peluzín se embarca en el mundo de la robótica.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Ortega se va unos días a vivir con Jonathan y esto crea un conflicto con Olaf, mientras Irmita espera la visita de su prima a quien le esconde un gran secreto.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El edificio Pino es desalojado por causas de fuerza mayor y todos tienen que buscar donde vivir, mientras que el Abuelo se deja caer en una espiral descendente debido a su gran ego.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego está despilfarrando su fortuna peor que nunca, mientras que Pitipú, Don Sebas y Gaspar buscan solucionar el problema de plomería del edificio Pino.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego busca desesperadamente una forma para recuperar su fortuna, mientras que el Abuelo se hace adicto al videojuego de moda.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego todavía no puede asimilar que perdió toda su fortuna, mientras que el Abuelo malaconseja a Peluzín de cómo pagar la renta atrasada de su departamento.

programme.title: La familia del barrio

programme.title: La familia del barrio

programme.title: Larry King Now: Tim McGraw
programme.desc: Larry chats with country music star, Tim McGraw, at the Venetian Hotel in Las Vegas. McGraw opens up about working with his wife, Faith Hill, raising teenage daughters, and making peace with his late father.

programme.title: Larry King Now: The Backstreet Boys
programme.desc: Larry sits down with the Backstreet Boys and talks about their new album, tour, and celebrating 20 years as a group. And, Larry King seeks a definition for the term boy band, a label the group never fully embraced

programme.title: Larry King Now: Celine Dion
programme.desc: Larry chats with pop music icon, Celine Dion, about her return to the spotlight, her new album, and how she is balancing motherhood and fame.

programme.title: Larry King Now: Jason Derulo
programme.desc: Jason Derulo is back! The singer goes in depth with Larry about his first album since severely breaking his neck, dating another famous singer, and what he thinks of his current musical competition.

programme.title: Larry King Now: Garth Brooks
programme.desc: It’s Garth Brooks! Country music’s best-selling artist sounds off on his admiration for Taylor Swift, his gripe with the modern music industry, and why taking time off to be with family was a great decision.

programme.title: Larry King Now: Ice Cube
programme.desc: Larry sits down with rapper turned actor and producer, Ice Cube, to talk about his new movie with Kevin Hart, his early years with seminal rap group NWA, and his thoughts on rap music today.

programme.title: Larry King Now: Akon
programme.desc: Music mogul and actor Akon reflects on his friendship with Michael Jackson, his work to bring electricity to Africa, and why he thinks monogamy is misguided. Plus, how Akon made Lady Gaga a superstar.

programme.title: Larry King Now: Willie Nelson
programme.desc: Country music megastar Willie Nelson invites Larry aboard his tour bus for an open conversation about life as an octogenarian, his iconic career, the legalization of marijuana, and the 2016 presidential race.

programme.title: Larry King Now: Common
programme.desc: For the first time ever, Larry welcomes a co-host to his den: NBA vet and style icon Baron Davis. The pair chat with Common about the importance of his tenth album, how his daughter influences his music, and his friendship with the late Maya Angelou.

programme.title: Larry King Now: Jason Mraz
programme.desc: Fresh off the release of his fifth studio album Yes!, Jason Mraz counters critics who accuse him of being too positive and explains why his heart will always be in coffee shops. Plus, Jason on his double life as an avocado farmer.

programme.title: Larry King Now: Flea
programme.desc: The Red Hot Chili Peppers' Flea sits down with Larry to talk about his new film 'Low Down' and why it's so near to his heart. Plus, they chat RHCP and Flea's upcoming memoir.

programme.title: Larry King Now: Will.i.am
programme.desc: Black Eyed Peas' co-creator will.i.am talks with Larry King about his exciting new smart watch venture, what he thinks about Taylor Swift, and why he's "disappointed" in President Obama.

programme.title: Larry King Now: Big Sean
programme.desc: From New York City, rapper Big Sean joins Larry King for a well-rounded discussion about his new album Dark Sky Paradise, learning from boss and mentor Kanye West, and recording with girlfriend Ariana Grande.

programme.title: Larry King Now: Ludacris
programme.desc: Chris 'Ludacris' Bridges sits down with Larry King to talk about 'Furious 7,' his new album 'Ludaversal,' and his early days working the graveyard shift as a radio DJ.

programme.title: Larry King Now: Mac Miller
programme.desc: In one of his most revealing interviews ever, rapper Mac Miller opens up to Larry about his battle with depression, discloses new information about his forthcoming album, GO:OD A.M., and chats about his ongoing feud with Donald Trump.

programme.title: Larry King Now: Seal
programme.desc: Four-time Grammy winner Seal joins Larry for an in-depth conversation on his new album, what it’s like co-parenting with ex-wife Heidi Klum, his opinion of Obama’s tenure, and much more.

programme.title: Larry King Now: Dolly Parton
programme.desc: The legendary entertainer welcomes Larry King to her Nashville studio to discuss her new album, her enduring career, and her longtime support for the LGBTQ community. Plus, Dolly on reuniting with her 9 to 5 co-stars Jane Fonda and Lily Tomlin.

programme.title: Larry King Now: Shawn Mendes
programme.desc: Shawn Mendes dishes on a variety of topics, including the process behind constructing his new album, Illuminate, and what fans can expect from a forthcoming world tour. Plus, Shawn opens up about handling global fame at such a young age.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine

programme.title: Matlock

programme.title: Matlock

programme.desc: Luffy recruits Tony Tony Chopper to join the Straw Hat crew as the ship’s doctor.

programme.desc: When Wapol orders his goons to attack the Straw Hats, Chopper shows off a little something he calls the Rumble Ball!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Wapol attacks Nami in her weakened condition, but Monkey B. Luffy is quick to step in and even the odds.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: After an explosive battle with Wapol, Luffy begins the tiring process of convincing Chopper to join his pirate gang.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Chopper sets sail for Alabasta with his new friends, and Dalton thinks back to his first meeting with Princess Vivi.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The Straw Hats rescue a man of many faces as they approach Alabasta. Sure, he’s good for a laugh, but they may regret pulling him out of the drink.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The Straw Hats arrive in Alabasta with precious little time to stop the rebellion. Sanji and Chopper are sent to gather supplies for a dangerous trip across the desert.

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Ace and Luffy’s happy reunion is crudely interrupted by the Billions of Baroque Works. They may be outnumbered, but these brothers are no ordinary pirates!

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The Straw Hats cross paths with the Barbar Sand Pirates, and Ace runs into big trouble when he gets separated from the group.

programme.title: One Piece

programme.desc: The Straw Hats continue their journey to Yuba, where a bittersweet reunion with a childhood friend awaits Princess Vivi.

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The assassins of Baroque Works gather at Spider’s Café, and the Straw Hats arrive at Yuba only to find it buried in sand.

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: One Piece

programme.desc: Dylan takes over a tourist barge in an attempt to escape mercenaries.

programme.desc: A body identification goes awry when it turns out Beka's former crewmate isn't dead at all.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: A woman is found stabbed to death in her apartment; with a long list of admirers, investigators uncover secret obsessions leading to a sadistic killer suspected by no one.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: A single mother is strangled to death in the middle of a Hawaiian paradise; investigators quickly focus in on two suspects, but nothing comes easy as they spend more than a decade striving to bring her killer to justice.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: A retired couple are found beaten to death in their country club estate, but detectives soon discover that what happens in Vegas doesn't always stay there as they hunt down this monstrous killer.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: A young woman is stabbed to death and suspects include a warlock and a rumored Wiccan lover; the case goes unsolved for years, until a triple homicide leads investigators to a dark obsession that costs four people their lives.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: A local beauty queen is found dead in a lake; as her small town grieves, law enforcement finds itself on a 20-plus year investigation that leads to a killer who was hiding in plain sight.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: An apartment fire proves to be arson set to cover up the murder of a young woman, but the discovery of a secret double life and unique evidence leads detectives to the killer.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: A witness comes face to face with the killer of a small-town beautician, but despite having an eyewitness, it would take years and a surprise tip to lead detectives to who strangled a beloved member of the community.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: When a 4-year-old finds his great-grandparents melted, he runs for help, launching an investigation into their double murder; greed takes center stage as detectives unwind this heart-wrenching case that leads them to a suspect no one saw coming.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: A young woman disappears, leaving the community hoping for her safe return; when she is found murdered, a string of mysterious anonymous tips takes detectives into a toxic world of jealousy and obsession.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: A missing persons case becomes something much darker when a sick, sinister affair is uncovered, leading investigators to believe foul play is involved.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: The mysterious shooting of a restaurateur with no solid suspects and no murder weapon leaves detectives in a lurch, but when financial motives come to light, an undercover operation and clever forensic investigation turn the case upside-down.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: A military veteran is missing and a young student is murdered in what appears to be a crime of passion, but the discovery of a secret payout leads police on a wild chase.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Taken in by a psychologist's pronouncement that the only happily married couples are those who fight members of the Addams household devise schemes to start a battle between Gomez (John Astin) and Morticia (Carolyn Jones).

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Gomez decides to bolster Cousin Itt's failing ego by making him the star of a production aimed as a birthday surprise for Wednesday. He hires the great director, Eric von Bissell, who gives Itt elocution lessons, causing a Hollywood star complex.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: While Morticia and Gomez are celebrating their 13th wedding anniversary, she tells Wednesday and Pugsley a bedtime story of how she and Gomez first met. In this episode, Carolyn Jones plays Morticia, Morticia as a 22-year-old, and sister Ophelia.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Wednesday and Pugsley refuse to go to bed until they hear the rest of the courtship story. Morticia resumes the tale via flashback, including the ceremony beginning with Ophelia Frump, Morticia's balmy sister, as the bride.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Romance seems close for Thing, the Addams right-hand-in-a-box, when Gomez's aunt arrives for a visit accompanied by Lady Fingers, her handmaiden. Thing enjoys the visit most because it gives him a chance to hold hands with one of his own kind.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez visit Mayor Henson to complain that their property tax is ridiculously low. After the Mayor proves his incompetence by offering a refund, Gomez is persuaded to become a candidate for the office.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: During a welcome home party for Cousin Itt, Morticia notices that the diminutive guest of honor seems to be losing his hair. Uncle Fester experiments with his chemistry set to produce a concoction that grows hair and tries the remedy on Itt.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Wednesday and Pugsley return in tears from trick-or-treating because a neighbor has told them there is no such thing as a witch. Morticia and Gomez plan to prove to the children that they do exist--by summoning a witch to a séance.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Determined to correct the dreadful literature that Wednesday and Pugsley are exposed to, Morticia sets out to create a new literary world. Gomez fears that his wife's first manuscript is so good, that once the publisher reads it he will lose her.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: In need of artistic fulfillment, Morticia takes up sculpting. An art critic views her first endeavor--a three-eyed Gomez statue--and clubs it with his cane. Gomez, who won't have Morticia's heart broken gets a seedy art dealer to buy it.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Pugsley copies one of his dad's old love letters and sends it to his teacher. Miss Dunbar comes to visit the Addams home and confesses to Gomez that no man has ever fallen so in love with her, leading Morticia to pretend to be the jealous wife.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: After Wednesday befriends a new boy her age, Robespierre Courtney, Morticia invites his parents, Mr. and Mrs. Henry Courtney to visit the Addams house for tea. Unbeknownst to them, the Courtney's are hoping to meet a number of the social set.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: There is a neighborhood burglar on the loose, and Morticia has reason to believe it could be Gomez. Morticia decides to probe his subconscious mind for a key to his criminality after she and Uncle Fester discover loot hidden in the storeroom.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia's pet plant Cleopatra gobbles up her favorite photo of Gomez from the family album. When the original photographer is found and asked to make a duplicate picture, it is discovered that he is now with the Department of Motor Vehicles.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Gomez plays host to Don Xavier Molines, a family friend during his childhood in Spain, and his daughter Consuella. Morticia's hospitality is put to the test when Consuella reveals that she has been promised in marriage to Gomez since childhood.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Wednesday's and Pugsley's faith in Santa Claus is shaken, Uncle Fester is chosen to back up Santa in case the real St. Nick is too busy to come. However, Fester-Santa gets stuck in the chimney, so each of the other adults fills in for him.

programme.title: The Addams Family

programme.title: The Addams Family

programme.title: The Addams Family

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: A woman's body is found and investigators have little time and few clues to lead them to a killer who could strike again. Perpetrators try to conceal their crimes, yet savvy investigators can take the most obscure data and recreate a murder.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: A friendly Midwest lodge becomes the scene of a gruesome double murder. Two men are dead and a safe filled with cash is missing.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Lies and deceit can often throw investigators off the trail of justice. But when hard evidence contradicts a killer's story, police must use the clues to piece together the truth.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: It is difficult to convict a murderer if the body can't be found. But forensic science is finding ways to do it. Devious killers can think up many was to dispose of their victim's remains, but they are often no matches for investigators.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: New Forensic Techniques used to Solve Old Cases: Advancement in science and technology are encouraging people to revisit the past in hopes of answering questions that have remained unanswered, and solving crimes that seemed unsolvable.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: At the scene of a murder, sometimes the victim provides the only clues to their killer. Forensic anthropologists use skeletal remains to decipher the clues written in the bones.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Sometimes when a death seems to be accidental or the result of a tragic accident, it is up to forensic scientists to reveal the deception lying just below the surface.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: A New York homebuyer gets more than he bargained for when a house inspection turns up a mummified corpse. For decades, the crime had gone undiscovered. The victim unmissed, and the killer unpunished.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: When teenagers are driven to kill, their victims are but the first to fall. In three such cases, the families of the killers, as well as their communities, become the victims of violent crime.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Killers often attempt to deflect attention away from their crimes by hiding the remains of their victims. Bodies may lay hidden for years before they are discovered.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: For homicide investigators, it's a race against time as they track their deadliest foe: a serial killer for whom killing is the only way to feel alive.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: When a murder is committed and deceit clouds the evidence, investigators turn to science and technology to uncover the truth and expose a murderous lie and capture the killer.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Ballistic analysis is the key to finding killers who turn guns on their victims. Each shot fired leaves its own “fingerprint”, allowing scientists to target murderers with deadly aim.

programme.title: The New Detectives

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Gavin and Ezra Martin think that Lucas killed their son Clemmie while taking part in a train robbery and Lucas refuses to tell them what really happened.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Eddie's daughter causes trouble for Lucas when two strangers threaten her life after she arrives with criminal information and stolen money.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Town character Brett Conway blackmails Lucas with the knowledge that a young couple Lucas rescued is suffering from yellow fever.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas and Mark are stranded in the middle of a desert with very little food or water, and after Lucas is injured, Mark becomes the only hope for their survival.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: While trying to protect Banker Hamilton's gold, Mark is kidnapped and held hostage at the McCain ranch and will be killed within the hour unless Lucas cooperates.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas makes a life-or-death decision when Micah is held hostage and the kidnappers demand the release of a notorious outlaw.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas tries to do a good deed for the old town drunk but it backfires when the drunk's son believes he inherited Lucas' ranch.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A dance hall singer asks Lucas to care for her daughter in an effort to hide the baby from her self-righteous, bigoted father.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas becomes involved in a battle between an aspiring writer and a cocky, bragging trail boss.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark runs away from home after his father questions his story about overhearing a plot to rob the bank.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A famous buffalo hunter tries to goad Lucas into a shooting match. When Lucas refuses, he becomes the new target.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When a stranger arrives to marry the town spinster, two brothers who want her land try to discourage him with threats and a beating.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark finds himself in grave danger when two unscrupulous detectives searching for a man's long-lost son claim that it's Mark.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas is drawn to a young widow passing through town on her way to claim an inheritance but others who covet it are trying to kill her.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: After a young stablehand kills a notorious gunslinger, he is baffled by the hostility of the townspeople about giving him the reward.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When a horse dealer transporting a prize stallion stops in North Fork, two saddle tramps try to use trickery to obtain it.

programme.title: The Rifleman

programme.desc: After foiling a girl's attempt to rob the general store, Lucas finds that she and her brother are plotting the murder of their abusive stepfather.

programme.desc: A condemned killer being transported by train murders a marshal and takes Mark hostage.

programme.desc: Lucas and Marshall Torrance get into trouble with the Army when they try to help a wounded young soldier who deserted.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: To keep his invalid mother happy, an outlaw forces Lucas and Mark to go along with a masquerade that he is the owner of Lucas's ranch.

programme.title: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Todos, héroes y villanos, se adaptan a las consecuencias del devastador incendio que destruyó la comunidad. Eugene encabeza a un grupo que parte en busca de Stephanie, guiados por la esperanza de encontrar otra civilización.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Princess asusta a los caballos de Eugene, Yumiko y Ezekiel, pero les promete otro medio de transporte. Mientras, Beta, en estado de delirio psicótico, guía a la horda de zombis hacia Alexandria para destruirlo todo.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Los seguidores de Beta se acercan a las puertas, y parte del grupo se impregna de sangre de zombi para intentar escapar entre la multitud de caminantes y regresar con ayuda. Sin embargo, los susurradores se mueven con cuchillos entre los zombis.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Maggie regresa, para consternación de Negan. Los desafíos que superó desde su partida han hecho que se vuelva difícil sobrevivir para ella y su hijo. Por otro lado, Daryl y Maggie luchan inesperadamente contra una amenaza invisible y desconocida.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Daryl y Carol encuentran una vieja cabaña que provoca que Daryl recuerde sus años alejado del grupo después de que Rick desapareció. Además, revive el doloroso recuerdo de encontrarse con un sobreviviente y los eventos tóxicos con Dog.

programme.title: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Eugene, Ezekiel, Yumiko y Princess son capturados y separados por los misteriosos soldados que los rodeaban en la estación ferroviaria. Princess lucha con los recuerdos de su traumático pasado y planea escapar.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Daryl y Carol toman caminos separados. Ella regresa a Alexandria, mientras él se adentra en los bosques. A partir de este momento, cado uno deberá usar sus habilidades de supervivencia.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
